description: A Full-Stack web application, Greenie is a community that inspires people to plant, earn, nuture and celebrate trees. This application consists of responsive design, signup and login features, CRUD functions, a store(e-commerce) where you can buy and sell trees, a dashboard for users to update and upload personal data, a payment gateway, a chat function.
JDK Eyewear is a full-stack ecommerce website, with payment integration, admin page, upload products, delete products, check and confirm orders, manage other parts of the web app.

A full-stack clothe e-commerce store. This application consists of a blog, responsive views, signup and login features, CRUD functions, a store(e-commerce) where you can buy clothes and other wears, a payment gateway, a school for fashion tutorials, email functions, IndexedDB local storage.

FixOn is a mobile application for a startup company. It is a platform where users can book services like plumbing, electrician, carpenter, etc. It has Razorpay payment gateway for online transactions.
